titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide that psychologist services are covered under part B of Medicare.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 1/6/1987--Introduced. Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to provide coverage under the supplementary medical insurance program (part B of title XVIII) for psychologists' services provided on an outpatient basis.
